title: Is zeds ultimate fine the way it is or should it work like kayns with a requirement?
body: Not a balance question im legit curious. I just thought it was wierd how Kayns has a requirement but zeds does not, when Zed's is undeniably better in most situations.

replies.body: An ahead Assassin Kayn can reasonably kill a squishy without ulting, an ahead zed still has to ult them.

prob not since the ult itself(not amp'd from dealing extra damage from other sources) is far weaker than kayns on its own.
